title: Grateful Dead Live at Nassau Coliseum on 1980-05-15
source: 2 Source Matrix by dusborne; Soundboard (shnid:93426) Recording Info: SBD -> Cassette Master -> Dat (48k); Transfer Info: Dat (Sony R500) -> VXPocket v2 -> Samplitude Professional v10.1 -> FLAC and Audience (shnid:126082) Recording by Jim Wise: Master Audience Cassette; 2 Sony ECM-280s> Sony D-5; Transfer and FLAC encoding by David Minches: Master played back on Nakamichi Dragon > Korg MR-1000(DSF [1-bit 5.6448 MHz Stereo]) Korg AudioGate > WAV [24/96] > Adobe Audition 3.0> FLAC encoding
